hero.title: Tailor-made websites.
hero.subtitle: Premium quality
hero.description: Seasoned web developer with a strong background in building custom solutions.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.question1: How long does a project usually take?
faq.answer1: The duration of a project depends on its complexity, but most projects are completed within 1 to 4 weeks. Simpler apps may take just a few days, while more complex systems might require more time for development and testing.
faq.question2: What technologies do I use for development?
faq.answer2: I specialize in modern web technologies including React, Next.js, Vue.js, Angular for frontend development, and Node.js, C# for backend development. I also work with various databases like MongoDB and MySQL.
faq.question3: What's the average cost of a project?
faq.answer3: Project costs depend on complexity, features, and timeline. I provide custom quotes based on your specific requirements. Contact me for a detailed proposal and transparent pricing.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.bigSubtitle: Tell me about your project and I will help bring your vision to life

form.name: Full Name
form.placeholderDescription: Tell me about your website project... What's your vision? What features do you need? Any specific requirements or preferences?
form.success: Thank you! I will get back to you soon about your website project.
form.error: Oops! Something went wrong. Please try again later.

contact.response: We typically respond within 24 hours ‚Ä¢ Free consultation included
contact.spam: Please do not submit spam or unsolicited offers. This form is for genuine project inquiries only.

catan.title: Catan - Online Board Game
catan.description: A modern, browser-based version of the classic board game Catan. Play with friends in a beautifully designed interface that captures the essence of the original game while adding new features for an enhanced gaming experience.

planit.title: PlanIt - The Card Game
planit.description: A fast, browser-based card game platform where you can enjoy classic games like Rummy, UNO, and Solitaire. No need to download, just pure gameplay designed for smooth play on any computer device.

greennest.title: GreenNest - Sustainable Living
greennest.description: A modern, responsive web application that helps you adopt a sustainable lifestyle. Explore green tips, track your carbon footprint, and join a community committed to environmental protection.

clearbuild.title: ClearBuild ‚Äì Renovation to Completion
clearbuild.description: ClearBuild is a modern construction and renovation company that provides reliable, high-quality execution for homes and businesses. From design to handover, we create durable and aesthetic spaces.

gondolkodtato.title: Gondolkodtat√≥ - Brain Training
gondolkodtato.description: A web application designed to challenge your mind with a variety of quizes. Improve your cognitive skills and memory with daily exercises.

study.title: Study Assistant Application
study.description: A straightforward web app to help you schedule study sessions and manage tasks. Easy add and organize your study hours and keep track of upcoming exams, all in one simple interface.

coincash.title: CoinCash - Cryptocurrency Exchange
coincash.description: A user-friendly platform for buying cryptocurrencies and tracking their price in real-time. Stay informed about the market, manage your digital investments effortlessly, all in one place.

bluecard.title: BlueCard
bluecard.description: A mobile companion app ideal for workplaces, colleges, and other secure facilities. Featuring QR codes, offers a convenient barcode on your phone. Sync devices easily and securely, all from your device.

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.description: Oops! The page you're looking for doesn't exist. It might have been moved, deleted, or you entered the wrong URL.
notFound.error: If you believe this is an error, please contact support or try refreshing the page.

hero.name: Rozs Norbert
hero.title: Seasoned Web Developer
hero.description: I am passionate about crafting tailor-made websites with precision and creativity. With a strong background in building custom solutions, I deliver premium quality design, fast performance, and modern code for your business success.
hero.description2: Currently pursuing Computer Engineering while working as a Frontend Developer. I love solving complex problems and turning ideas into beautiful, functional web experiences.

skills.title: What I Bring to the Table
skills.description: Over the years, I have honed my skills across the full development spectrum. Here are the technologies I am most passionate about working with:

tools.title: Tools & Technologies
tools.description: Utilizing the latest technologies for optimal performance

precision.title: Precision
precision.description: Every line of code serves a purpose. I believe in clean, maintainable solutions.

performance.title: Performance
performance.description: Fast loading times and smooth user experiences are non-negotiable.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: I stay current with the latest technologies to deliver modern solutions..

jobs.title: My Professional Journey
jobs.description: From student to professional developer - here is how I have grown and what I have accomplished along the way.

erp2u.title: Junior Frontend Developer
erp2u.description: Currently focused on developing modern, responsive web applications using cutting-edge frontend technologies. I work closely with design teams to bring creative visions to life while ensuring optimal user experience and performance.

tiwala.title: Frontend Developer
tiwala.description: Currently focused on developing modern, responsive web applications using cutting-edge frontend technologies. I work closely with design teams to bring creative visions to life while ensuring optimal user experience and performance.

integrity.title: Fullstack Developer
integrity.description: This role really shaped me as a developer. I built complete web solutions from database design to user interfaces. Working on diverse projects taught me the importance of scalable architecture and clean code practices.

freelance.title: Freelance Web Developer
freelance.description: This is where my passion truly began. Working directly with clients taught me the business side of development - understanding requirements, managing timelines, and delivering solutions that really make a difference. Every project is a new adventure!

proud.title: What I am Proud Of
proud.description: I believe that every project is an opportunity to learn and innovate. I am excited about the future and the challenges it will bring!

studies.title: Learning Never Stops
studies.description: Balancing formal education with real-world experience has given me both theoretical knowledge and practical skills.

sze.title: Computer Engineering (BSc)
sze.skills: Data Structures, Algorithms, System Design, Software Engineering
sze.description: Currently pursuing my bachelor's degree while working full-time. It is challenging but incredibly rewarding! I love how the theoretical concepts connect with the real-world problems I solve at work. Advanced studies in algorithms, system design, and software architecture.

jedlik.title: Software Developer and Tester
jedlik.school: Gy≈ëri SZC Jedlik √Ånyos G√©pipari √©s Informatikai Technikum
jedlik.description: This is where it all began! My foundation in programming started here. Learning the basics of coding, understanding testing methodologies, and discovering my passion for creating digital solutions. Those late nights debugging code taught me persistence pays off!

personal.title: Beyond Code
personal.description: I believe that a well-rounded life fuels creativity and innovation. Here are some of my passions outside of coding:

music.title: Music
music.description: I code better with good music! From pop beats to classical - music fuels my creativity.

learning.title: Continuous Learning
learning.description: Always exploring new technologies, reading tech blogs, and taking online courses.

gaming.title: Gaming
gaming.description: Gaming taught me problem-solving and strategic thinking - skills I use in development too!

travel.title: Travel & Culture
travel.description: Exploring different places and cultures gives me fresh perspectives for creative solutions.

pricing.title: Pricing & Services
pricing.description: Transparent pricing for quality web development services. Choose the package that best fits your project needs.

basic.title: Basic Website
basic.description: Perfect for small businesses and personal portfolios
basic.features: Responsive Design, Home + 404 Page, Contact Form, Basic SEO, Mobile Optimization, 3 Months Support, 3 Revisions

advanced.title: Advanced Web App
advanced.description: Full-featured web applications with custom functionality
advanced.features: Responsive Design, Up to 5 Pages, Advanced SEO, Mobile Optimization, Performance Optimization, 6 Months Support, 8 Revisions
advanced.note: Everything is included from the Basic Website package

custom.title: Custom Solutions
custom.features: Custom Development, Database Integration, User Authentication, Up to 5 Pages, Admin Dashboard, API Integration, 6 Months Support, Performance Optimization, 5 Revisions
custom.note: Everything is included from the Advanced Website package

pricing.notes: All prices are estimates and may vary based on project complexity and requirements. Contact me for a detailed quote tailored to your specific needs. Upfront payment is required to start the project, with a 25% deposit and the remaining balance due upon completion.

timeline.title: Timeline
timeline.description: This timeline is a general guideline and may vary based on project complexity and requirements. Each phase includes regular updates and client feedback sessions to ensure alignment with your vision.

pricingfooter.description: If you have any questions or need a custom quote, feel free to reach out.
pricingfooter.title: Looking forward to working together!
